title: Assistant Brand Manager
description: Job description for Assistant Brand Manager at EVJ COSMETIC & BEAUTYDeskripsi PerusahaanEVJ Beauty adalah merek kecantikan dan perawatan pribadi yang berkembang pesat di Cengkareng. Kami berkomitmen untuk menghadirkan produk berkualitas tinggi, inovatif, dan berkelanjutan, serta memberikan pengalaman terbaik bagi pelanggan.Deskripsi PekerjaanKami mencari Junior Brand Manager yang energik dan kreatif untuk bergabung dengan tim kami secara full-time di kantor Cengkareng. Dalam peran ini, Anda akan bertanggung jawab mengelola strategi brand harian, meningkatkan kesadaran merek, dan mendorong keterlibatan pelanggan.Tanggung Jawab UtamaMengembangkan dan melaksanakan strategi manajemen merek.Berkolaborasi dengan tim marketing untuk membuat materi promosi, konten, dan iklan.Menganalisis tren pasar, wawasan konsumen, dan aktivitas kompetitor.Memantau kinerja merek dan memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan.Mendukung peluncuran produk baru dan inisiatif desain kemasan.Menjaga konsistensi pesan merek di semua saluran komunikasi.KualifikasiPendidikan minimal S1 di bidang Marketing, Manajemen Bisnis, atau bidang terkait.Pengalaman di manajemen merek atau pemasaran (fresh graduate dipersilakan melamar).Keterampilan komunikasi dan interpersonal yang baik.Kemampuan analitis, berpikir strategis, dan perhatian pada detail.Mampu bekerja secara mandiri maupun dalam tim.Terampil menggunakan perangkat lunak terkait, seperti MS Office atau platform pemasaran.Keuntungan Bergabung dengan EVJ BeautyLingkungan kerja yang inovatif dan kolaboratif.Peluang pengembangan karier.WFH (Work From Home) 1 kali dalam sebulan.Read Less

title: Marketing Executive
min_exp: Less than a year of experience
description: Job description for Marketing Executive at POLISKJob Overview:We’re on the hunt for a dynamic Marketing Executive to join our team as our very first hire! You’ll be the extension of our founder and the heartbeat of our marketing efforts, making a real impact on brand awareness. If you have a passion for fashion, content creation, and community engagement, this role is perfect for you!Key Responsibilities:Rock our social media platforms by creating fun and engaging content that builds a loyal online community.⁠Dream up and execute innovative marketing strategies to boost our brand awareness and strengthen our community ties.Analyze marketing campaign performance like a pro and share insights that keep us moving forward.⁠Collaborate with fabulous influencers who resonate with our values to help spread the POLISK love.⁠Organize and participate in exciting community events or pop-ups that put our brand front and center.⁠Stay ahead of the game by actively conducting market research to spot ongoing trends and growth opportunities.⁠Team up with our founder to align marketing initiatives with our fabulous product launches.Qualifications:⁠A Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing Communications, Business, or Fashion (fresh graduates are welcome to apply!)Previous internship or work experience related to the job description is a plus!Experience in content creation, social media management, and community engagement.⁠A proven track record of measurable growth in previous roles.⁠Ability to stay at the forefront of creative trends and adapt strategies like a marketing ninja.Having photo and video editing software proficiency (e.g. Adobe Software Creative Suite, After Effect, and so on).Basic knowledge of analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, social media insights) is a plus.Ability to handle multiple projects, meet deadlines, and deliver top-quality results.Confident in doing voice-overs or shining in video content? We want you!Why Join Us:At POLISK, you won’t just be another employee; you’ll be a crucial part of our journey to shape our marketing direction and build a vibrant community around our brand. If you’re passionate about fashion, storytelling, and connecting with people, we can’t wait to meet you!Read Less

title: Asisten Manager Digital Marketing
description: Job description for Asisten Manager Digital Marketing at PT Sapta Jayasejati IndonesiaThe Assistant Manager - Digital Marketing will support the digital marketing team in implementing, optimizing, and managing digital marketing campaigns to drive brand visibility, lead generation, and business growth. The role involves assisting in strategy development, execution, performance analysis, and reporting of digital campaigns across multiple online channels such as social media, paid advertising, SEO, email marketing, and content marketing.Job DescriptionDigital Marketing Campaign Management :Assist in the planning, execution, and optimization of digital marketing campaigns across channels such as Google Ads, social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok), and email.Coordinate with internal teams and external agencies to ensure campaigns run smoothly and achieve KPIs (Key Performance Indicators).Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.Social Media Management:Develop and schedule engaging social media content that aligns with the brand’s goals and resonates with the target audience.Monitor social media trends, analyze competitors, and recommend content strategies to enhance engagement and brand awareness.Interact with followers and manage customer feedback or inquiries on social media platformsSEO and SEM Strategy:Assist in the implementation of SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and content development.Support in managing paid search campaigns (Google Ads, Bing Ads), analyzing performance metrics, and optimizing ads to maximize ROI.Email Marketing:Plan and execute email marketing campaigns, including newsletters, promotional emails, and lead nurturing sequences.Segment email lists to target the right audience, and track email performance to improve open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.Content Strategy and Creation:Collaborate with the content team to create and distribute high-quality digital content (blog posts, videos, infographics) to support digital campaigns and SEO.Ensure content is consistent with brand messaging and optimized for SEO and social sharing.Market Research and Trend Analysis:Stay updated with digital marketing trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activity.Conduct market research and consumer behavior analysis to refine strategies and improve engagement.Job RequirementsEducation: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field (Master’s degree preferred).Experience: Minimum 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on campaign management, SEO, SEM, and social media.Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data and generate insights to optimize campaigns.Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills.Creativity & Problem-Solving: Ability to think creatively and solve marketing challenges.Technical Skills: Proficiency in digital marketing tools like Google Ads, Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager, email marketing platforms (Mailchimp, etc.), and SEO tools (SEMrush, Ahrefs).Strong knowledge of SEO and SEM best practices.Understanding of content marketing strategies and social media platforms.Read Less

title: Community Engagement Officer
description: Job description for Community Engagement Officer at noovoleumJob Description:As the Community Engagement Officer, you'll be the mastermind behind building and thriving noovoleum communities. Your efforts will directly contribute to our mission of promoting environmental sustainability, getting new app users and used cooking oil volume.Key Responsibilities:Act as a passionate and knowledgeable advocate for our company within your community.Initiate and lead engaging discussions to educate individuals about the benefits of recycling used cooking oil.Foster meaningful relationships with community members, local organizations, and influencers to promote noovoleum's mission.Provide hands-on assistance and support to users, ensuring they have a seamless experience and can fully maximize their recycling efforts.Collaborate with local businesses, schools, and community centres to establish partnerships.Organize and participate in promotional events, workshops, and campaigns to drive awareness and adoption of our solutions.Gather feedback, suggestions, and insights from the community to help improve the UCOllect app and user experience.Requirements:Proven experience in Community Engagement and Event Organization with a track record of driving results.Strong communication and negotiation skills.Excellent self-discipline, especially in managing your own time whether you're working remotely or in the office.Problem-solving mindset and high initiatives.Passion for sustainability and environmental responsibility.Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment.Previous experience in waste management or biofuel industry is a plus!Ability to be mobile and to travel for work (ideally own a motorcycle).Ability to be placed anywhere based on company needs, including areas such as Bali, Bojonegoro, Tangerang, Jakarta, Balikpapan and Surabaya.Read Less

title: Creative Content Creator
description:
Job description for Creative Content Creator at CaselifyIni merupakan Job Hybrid (bisa WFO / WFH)

Deskripsi Tugas:1. Membuat konten kreatif dan menarik untuk berbagai platform, termasuk instagram, youtube, tiktok, dan lainnya.2. Melakukan pengambilan gambar/video untuk keperluan konten3. Mengaplikasikan teknik editing profesional termasuk color grading, efek visual, dan animasi.4. Memastikan semua konten sesuai dengan standar kualitas dan branding yang telah ditentukan.5. Berkolaborasi dengan tim kreatif untuk menghasilkan konten yang menarik dan berkualitas tinggi.Syarat dan Kriteria:Berpengalaman dalam bidang content creator minimal 2 tahunMampu menguasai copywriting dan editing video dan gambarMengikuti tren social media masa kini (Tiktok , IG reels , FB , shopee video , youtube)Harus bisa bekerja dengan cepat untuk mengejar tayang.Siap bekerja di bawah tekanan dan tenggat waktu yang ketat.Memahami algoritma YouTube dan memiliki ide-ide inovatif untuk meningkatkan performa video.Read Less

title: Livestreamer E-commerce (Shopee/Tiktok)
description: Job description for Livestreamer E-commerce (Shopee/Tiktok) at CaselifyJob Description:Ini adalah Job WFO, sebagai Host Live Streaming di Caselify yang berlokasi di Kalideres, Jakarta Barat. Sebagai Host Live Streaming, Anda akan bertanggung jawab untuk melaksanakan sesi live streaming untuk mempromosikan dan memasarkan produk Case hp Caselify, berinteraksi dengan pelanggan, memberikan pelayanan pelanggan yang baik selama live streaming, serta berjualan agar calon buyer tertarik dengan apa yang kamu jual.Job Responsibilities:1. Melakukan Live streaming di semua Platform E-commerce (Shopee,Lazada,Tiktok dan Tokopedia) untuk meningkatkan penjualan 2. menguasai Kebijakkan dan data analysis Platform yang akan di livekan3. membuat strategi jualan atau gimmick2 yang bisa menaikkan penjualan4. Mampu Menaikkan viewer dan mempertahankan viewer agar stay tune dan tertarik dengan live streaming yang di bawakanJob Requirements:1. Berpengalaman dalam berjualan secara live streaming minimal 1-2tahun di E-commerce (Tiktok, Shopee, dll)2. Keterampilan komunikasi & public speaking yang sangat baik3. Keterampilan presentasi produk yang sangat baik4. Berorientasi pada penjualan dan target5 .Familiar dan percaya diri di depan kamera6. Penampilan menarik dan rapi7. Bersedia bekerja dalam shift bergilir, termasuk akhir pekan, dan mematuhi kebijakan kerja penuh waktu di kantorRead Less

title: Content Creator - Staff
description: Job description for Content Creator - Staff at NoTag International IndonesiaNoTag Indonesia (PT Dable Labs Indonesia)[Company Intro]NoTag Korea is a Korean IT-based retailing start-up company that was founded in 2021. Within just three years of operation, NoTag Korea has secured a total of 3 million USD series-A investment from at least 7 notable Korean investment firms, including Lotte Group (Lotte Ventures). As of 2023, NoTag Korea is selling over 80 brands, ranging from Korean cosmetics to fashion products, and operating in 7 countries, such as Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Australia, etc. We have recently set up our first overseas office in Taiwan and we are currently looking for talented & keen individuals to join our new office in Indonesia, located within Lotte Shopping Avenue, South Jakarta.[Responsibilities & Job Description]Manage accounts & design contents for Social Media (Instagram, TikTok, etc)Manage Customer Service (Emails, Chats, DMs & etc)Upload & manage products/SKUs on online platforms (Shopify, Shopee & Tokopedia)Occasional external marketing activitiesCommunicate with 3PL PICs to check on logistics status[Application Process]CV screening → 1st Interview (Online)→ 2nd Interview (Online/Offline)→ SelectionRequired documents: CV (English) & Portfolio (Mandatory)Hiring until suitable candidates are found[Office Location]Lotte Mall Jakarta, South Jakarta[Requirements]Proficient in design tools & other photoshop softwaresAble to edit videos using simple tools2 ~5 years of experience in the relevant fieldAble to work in South JakartaFamiliar with social media operations[Preferred Qualifications]Have contacts with Indonesian influencersExperienced in video editing (Instagram Reels, etc)Extensive experience & knowledge of Korean products (fashion, cosmetics, etc)Have past experiences in the Indonesian E-Commerce sector[Incentives]BPJSTHRRead Less

title: Digital Ads Specialist untuk Properti Distress
description: Job description for Digital Ads Specialist untuk Properti Distress at Ozindo PropertyDicari Digital Ads Specialist untuk Properti DistressKami adalah perusahaan properti yang fokus pada aset distress, mencari Digital Ads Specialist untuk membantu mempromosikan properti secara efektif melalui media sosial.Tugas Utama:1. Mengelola Iklan Properti:Mengelola dan mengoptimalkan iklan properti yang dipilih untuk dipromosikan.Memastikan iklan menjangkau target audiens yang tepat.Menulis copywriting iklan yang menarik dan persuasif.2. Meningkatkan Leads Berkualitas:Menyusun strategi promosi yang fokus pada menghasilkan leads berkualitas untuk properti yang sedang dipasarkan.3. Berkoordinasi dengan Tim Desain:Memberikan arahan isi konten (teks dan konsep) agar sesuai dengan materi iklan yang dipromosikan4. Fokus pada Hasil:Menargetkan dan menghasilkan leads berkualitas yang memiliki potensi tinggi untuk dikonversi menjadi penjualan.5. Optimalisasi Kampanye:Menganalisis performa iklan untuk mencapai hasil terbaik dengan budget yang efisien.6. Mendukung Branding Perusahaan:Membantu meningkatkan branding perusahaan di media sosial.Menyusun strategi konten untuk memperkuat branding perusahaan sebagai pemimpin di properti distress.Kualifikasi:Pengalaman dalam iklan properti melalui Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, TikTok Ads dan Terbukti mampu menghasilkan leads berkualitas dan meningkatkan omzet perusahaan.Pemahaman tentang properti distressed /lelang/ NPL menjadi nilai tambah.Skema Kerja dan Keuntungan:Flexible: Full-time, part-time, atau freelance, disesuaikan dengan diskusi awal.Kompensasi menarik dengan peluang bonus berdasarkan hasil penjualan.Cara Melamar:Kirimkan CV, portofolio iklan, dan hasil leads keozindoproperty @gmail.comdengan subjek "Digital Ads Specialist .Bergabunglah bersama kami untuk membantu menjual properti unggulan dan menciptakanhasil terbaik!Read Less

title: digital marketing
description: Job description for digital marketing at PT. title: Social Media Analyst
description: Job description for Social Media Analyst at Soogee Creative AgencyJob Descriptions:Memantau performa konten sosial media melalui metrik seperti engagement rate, impressions, reach, dan CTR.Menganalisis tren dan pola pengguna untuk mengidentifikasi peluang dan area perbaikan.Memberikan rekomendasi berbasis data untuk meningkatkan strategi sosial media.Mengidentifikasi jenis konten yang paling efektif untuk audiens target.Membuat laporan berkala tentang performa sosial media, termasuk keberhasilan kampanye dan ROI.Mengomunikasikan temuan kepada tim pemasaran dan klienMemantau tren media sosial terbaru dan perubahan algoritma platform untuk menjaga relevansi strategi.Menganalisis performa kompetitor di sosial media sebagai benchmark untuk mengembangkan strategi yang kompetitif.Job Requirements:Pengalaman menggunakan tools seperti Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, Hootsuite, atau Sprout Social.Kemampuan membaca dan menginterpretasi data secara mendalam.Pemahaman mendalam tentang algoritma platform utama (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter/X, dll.).Mampu menghubungkan data dengan rekomendasi konten kreatif yang relevan.Kemampuan menyampaikan insight data secara jelas kepada tim non-teknis.Minimal 1-2 tahun di bidang analitik sosial media atau pemasaran digital.Read Less

title: Tenaga Pelatih Digital Marketing (for Prakerja)
description:
Job description for Tenaga Pelatih Digital Marketing (for Prakerja) at Ioda AcademyDeskripsi Pekerjaan:Sebagai Tenaga Pelatih untuk program Prakerja, Anda akan bertanggung jawab untuk menyampaikan materi selama program Prakerja sesuai dengan materi yang disediakan oleh tim Learning kami.

Tanggung Jawab:Mengajar materi selama 3 jam setiap hari dari Senin hingga Jumat, dengan waktu antara pukul 18.00 - 22.00.Berinteraksi dan membimbing peserta secara aktif selama sesi kelas.Bekerja secara profesional dalam tim dan memiliki keterampilan manajemen waktu yang baik.Kualifikasi:Memiliki pengalaman minimal 5 tahun di bidang terkait.Lulusan dari bidang terkait akan lebih diutamakan.Memiliki profil LinkedIn yang aktif dan profesional.Memiliki perangkat (Laptop/PC) dan koneksi internet yang memadai.Pengalaman sebagai Mentor/Speaker di acara webinar diutamakan.Memiliki pengalaman di program Prakerja diutamakan.

KeuntunganKesempatan untuk bekerja secara online (remote).Honorarium per sesi.Sertifikat sebagai Tenaga Pelatih.Pengalaman mengajar dan membimbing.Memperluas jaringan profesional.Read Less

title: Event Specialist
description:
Job description for Event Specialist at PT Keren Entertainment IndonesiaJob Requirement :Terbuka untuk fresh graduate hanya dari jurusan pengelolaan acara.Memiliki pengalaman bekerja dengan event organizer sebagai event specialist maupun freelance.Seorang multitasker, detail, mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan, dan menaati deadline.Mampu bekerjasama dalam team dan menerima arahan dengan baik.Memiliki ide kreatif dan cepat beradaptasi dengan fast-paced environment.Memahami pekerjaan sebagai event specialist di event organizer. Memahami infomasi seputar produk ITBersedia untuk belajar hal baru dan memiliki keinginan kuat untuk tumbuh bersama team.Bersedia dengan jam kerja yang fleksibel dan ditempatkan di Cipondoh, Tangerang.

Job Description : Bertanggung jawab pada Project Manager.Mengembangkan konsep event dari tema yang telah ditentukan oleh Project Manager.Membantu merencanakan garis besar kebutuhan acara.Melakukan riset untuk keperluan event dan menuangkan hasil riset dalam bentuk database.Melakukan negosiasi dengan vendor.Melakukan booking MC, pembicara, dan talent.Membuat terms of reference dan rundown.Menyiapkan surat undangan, surat perizinan, serta surat kerjasama.Mengeksekusi acara di hari H.Read Less

title: Content Creator
description: Job description for Content Creator at Millenial Project Group1.	Membuat dan Mengelola Konten Digital:•	Menghasilkan konten menarik dan berkualitas (teks, foto, video, grafik) untuk media sosial, website, dan platform lainnya.•	Membuat kalender konten dan merencanakan strategi unggahan secara rutin.2.	Pengembangan Konsep Kreatif:•	Mengembangkan ide-ide kreatif yang sesuai dengan nilai perusahaan dan target audiens.•	Berkolaborasi dengan tim marketing untuk kampanye promosi properti.3.	Pengelolaan Media Sosial:•	Mengelola akun media sosial perusahaan, termasuk menjawab komentar dan pesan.•	Melakukan analisis performa konten menggunakan tools seperti Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, atau lainnya.4.	Fotografi dan Videografi:•	Mendokumentasikan properti perusahaan dan aktivitas terkait untuk dijadikan konten.•	Melakukan editing foto dan video untuk meningkatkan kualitas visual.5.	Update Tren Digital:•	Mengikuti tren terkini di bidang properti, media sosial, dan teknologi pemasaran digital.•	Memanfaatkan tren untuk membuat konten yang relevan dan menarik.6.	Pengelolaan Iklan Digital (opsional):•	Membantu tim dalam membuat materi iklan digital untuk promosi properti di platform seperti Instagram Ads, TikTok Ads, dan lainnya.Kualifikasi (Job Requirement)1.	Pendidikan minimal SMK atau D3/S1 di bidang Komunikasi, Desain Grafis, Marketing, atau bidang terkait.2.	Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun sebagai Content Creator atau di bidang terkait.3.	Menguasai software desain grafis dan editing seperti Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, atau Canva.4.	Kemampuan fotografi dan videografi, termasuk pengeditan dasar.5.	Pemahaman tentang algoritma dan tren media sosial (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, dll).6.	Kreatif, inovatif, dan memiliki kemampuan storytelling yang baik.7.	Mampu bekerja dalam tim, memenuhi deadline, dan bersikap responsif terhadap feedback.8.	Memahami dasar-dasar strategi digital marketing menjadi nilai tambah.9.	Memiliki portofolio karya yang relevan untuk ditunjukkan.Read Less

title: Tiktok Livestream Team (Production Assistant)
description: Job description for Tiktok Livestream Team (Production Assistant) at FYC MANAGEMENTJob Description:- Responsible for managing various aspects of livestream production, from pre-event planning to live execution and post-production tasks. title: Sales & Marketing (Bali)
description: Job description for Sales & Marketing (Bali) at PT IDEFAB CIPTAPT IDEFAB CIPTA, which stands for Interior Design Fabrics & Furnishings, is a leading provider of high-quality fabrics for both outdoor and indoor use, such as for furniture and curtains. IDEFAB is part of the Agora Indonesia distributor group. We collaborate with interior designers, architects, contractors, property developers, and private clients on various projects in the hospitality, commercial space, and residential industries.We are looking for dynamic and motivated individuals who can thrive in a fast-paced environment and contribute to the growth and success of the company. If you have an interest in sales and are ready to take on new challenges, we invite you to join our team.Job Responsibilities:Introduce and sell our products to contractors, interior designers, architects, property developers, and private clients.Develop effective sales plans to achieve set targets.Build strong relationships with stakeholders in the industry, including designers, contractors, and property developers.Create regular reports on sales activities, including target achievements and market analysis.Provide solutions and product recommendations that align with clients' project needs.Qualifications:Male/Female with high enthusiasm and motivation.Minimum education of D3/S1 in any discipline, with relevant experience as a plus.At least 2 years of experience in sales & marketing, particularly related to products or services in interior design, textiles, or furniture.Willing to work overtime if needed to meet targets or project deadlines.Preferably has self-taught knowledge or formal education in textiles, furniture, or interior design, providing in-depth understanding of products and the industry.Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with strong negotiation abilities to build relationships with clients, partners, and other stakeholders.Well-groomed appearance, with a polite, patient, and professional attitude, capable of maintaining ethics while interacting with various individuals.Target-oriented with high motivation to achieve and exceed set goals, and able to work under pressure in demanding situations.Quick to learn new things, adaptive to changes and trends in the industry, and enjoys challenges that offer opportunities for personal growth.Detail-oriented, goal-focused, and capable of managing multiple tasks simultaneously while ensuring all tasks are completed accurately and on time.Able to work both independently and within a team, collaborating with internal and external parties.Proactive and creative in problem-solving, with the ability to provide recommendations or new ideas to improve performance and product quality.Fluent in English.Willing to be placed in Bali.Read Less

description: Job description for AI Engineer at PT Naga Trade InternationalAI Engineer: - Memahami konsep dasar AI termasuk pembelajaran mesin, pemrosesan Bahasa alami, penglihatan komputer, dan sistem kecerdasan buatan lainnya. - Memiliki kemampuan pemrograman yang baik, terutama dalam bahasa seperti Python, R, Java, atau C++. - Dapat menguji dan mengoptimalkan algoritma-algoritma AI serta model-model prediktif. - Memiliki kemampuan untuk mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan menganalisis data untuk mendukung pengembangan sistem kecerdasan buatan. - Memiliki ide-ide yang kreatif dalam pengembangan sistem kecerdasan buatan. - Memahami etis dan hukum yang menyangkut penggunaan dan pengembangan AI. - Mampu mengatasi masalah dalam pengembangan Sistem AI - Membantu data scientist dengan menerapkan automasi- Berkolaborasi bersama business dan data analyst- Penerapan Algoritma Artificial Intelligence- Mampu melakukan analisa yang baik terkait algoritma dan matematika.- Berkompeten dalam menguasai perangkat yang mengelola big data Requirement: - Minimal gelar Sarjana Matematika, Statistika, Ilmu Komputer, Teknik (preferensi Teknik Teknologi Informasi). -.Pengalaman yang terbukti sebagai pengembang Python dengan pemahaman yang kuat tentang kerangka kerja Python (seperti Django, Flask, atau Pyramid). - Pengalaman dengan pemrosesan bahasa alami, visi komputer, atau pembelajaran mendalam sangat diinginkan. - Keterampilan pemecahan masalah yang sangat baik dan kemampuan berpikir secara algoritmik. - Keterampilan analitis yang kuat dan kemampuan untuk bekerja dengan struktur data yang kompleks dan algoritma komputasi. - Gaji Rp 100.000.000 – Rp 150.000.000Read Less

title: AI Engineer
description: Job description for Python Developer - Web Scraping & NLP at PT Sonar Analitika IndonesiaJob DescriptionWe are looking for a skilled Python Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining scripts for web scraping, as well as building automation systems for data tagging using NLP or Large Language Models (LLMs). If you have a passion for working with data, automating processes, and leveraging the power of NLP, this role is for you!ResponsibilitiesDevelop and optimize Python scripts for web scraping to collect data from various online sources.Implement automation for data tagging to classify data into “noise” and “non-noise” categories using NLP or LLMs.Clean, preprocess, and structure data to ensure it is ready for analysis.Collaborate with the data team to integrate the scraped and tagged data into existing workflows.Monitor and maintain web scraping scripts to adapt to changes in website structures.Research and experiment with the latest NLP and LLM technologies to improve tagging accuracy.Debug and troubleshoot issues in scripts and data pipelines.Job RequirementsBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).Experienced as Python Developer at least 1 year.Proficiency in Python, with experience in web scraping libraries.Strong understanding of NLP techniques and frameworks.Familiarity with Large Language Models and their applications.Experience with automation and task scheduling tools.Knowledge of data preprocessing techniques, including handling unstructured data.Understanding of REST APIs and JSON data format for integrating external services.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field, or equivalent experience.Knowledge of database systems (SQL or NoSQL).Ability to work independently and collaborate with a remote team.Read Less

title: STAFF IT
description: Job description for Data Scientist at MaknadataThe Data Scientist is responsible for analyzing complex datasets to derive actionable insights, build predictive models, and drive data-driven decision-making across the organization. The role involves using advanced statistical techniques, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization tools to solve business problems and optimize processes.Key Responsibilities:Data Analysis: Collect, clean, and analyze large datasets from multiple sources to uncover trends, patterns, and relationships.Model Development: Develop, test, and implement machine learning models and algorithms to solve business problems and improve decision-making processes.Predictive Analytics: Build predictive models to forecast future trends and behaviors, providing recommendations based on the data.Statistical Analysis: Apply advanced statistical techniques to understand data distributions, correlations, and significance, and to support decision-making.Data Visualization: Create compelling data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights effectively to stakeholders across the organization.Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and business analysts, to understand their data needs and deliver data-driven solutions.Experimentation: Design and conduct A/B tests and other experiments to evaluate the impact of different strategies and actions.Data Management: Oversee data quality and integrity, ensuring that data is accurate, complete, and reliable for analysis.Automation: Develop and implement automated processes for data collection, analysis, and reporting.Continuous Learning: Stay current with the latest trends and advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, and apply them to business challenges.Documentation: Document methodologies, models, and processes to ensure transparency and reproducibility of results.Required Qualifications:Education: Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.Experience: 3-5 years of experience in data science, machine learning, or a similar analytical role.Technical Skills:Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R.Strong knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, Scikit-learn) and frameworks.Experience with data manipulation tools (e.g., SQL, Pandas).Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) is a plus.Proficiency in data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Matplotlib.Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to work with complex datasets.Statistical Knowledge: In-depth understanding of statistical methods and their applications in data science.Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights for non-technical stakeholders.Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy and attention to detail in data analysis and model development.Read Less

title: Data Scientist
description: Job description for Business Intelligence Analyst at MaknadataJob Summary:The Business Intelligence Analyst is responsible for analysing data, developing reports, and providing insights that help the organisation improve its operations and decision-making processes. The role involves working with various data sources, using BI tools to create dashboards and visualisations, and collaborating with stakeholders to understand their data needs.Key Responsibilities:Data Analysis: Collect, clean, and analyse data from various sources to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.Report Development: Design, develop, and maintain business intelligence dashboards, reports, and visualisations using BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, QlikView).Data Modeling: Build and maintain data models that support analytical capabilities, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with business units to understand their data needs and provide actionable insights.Performance Metrics: Develop and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure business performance and identify areas for improvement.Data Quality: Ensure data integrity and accuracy by conducting regular audits and implementing data governance practices.Data Strategy: Contribute to the development and implementation of the organisation’s data strategy, ensuring alignment with business goals.Ad Hoc Analysis: Conduct ad hoc data analyses to support specific business needs and projects.Training & Support: Provide training and support to end-users on BI tools and data interpretation.Required Qualifications:Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.Experience: 2-4 years of experience in business intelligence, data analysis, or a similar role.Technical Skills:Proficiency in BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, QlikView).Strong knowledge of SQL for data querying.Experience with data modelling and data warehousing concepts.Familiarity with programming languages like Python or R is a plus.Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets.Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present data insights clearly to non-technical stakeholders.Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy and attention to detail in all aspects of work.Preferred Qualifications:Experience with ETL Processes: Knowledge of extract, transform, load (ETL) processes and tools.Advanced Analytics: Experience with advanced analytics techniques such as predictive modeling and machine learning.Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with the industry in which the organization operates, understanding specific business challenges and data needs.Read Less

title: Data Scientist
description:
Job description for Engineering Staff at PT Creative Event EntertainmentCOMPANYCEE (Creative Event Entertainment) is an Estate Management (SCBD Park) and Event Organizer. (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud), Microservices, APIs, and enterprise system integration.Strong understanding of various technology domains, including software development, data architecture, security, and infrastructure.Experience with DevOps practices, automation, and modern technology stacks.Proven ability to lead, mentor, and grow a team of architects, fostering a collaborative and innovative guidelines, and methodologies to ensure consistency across all projects.Oversee the integration of architectural solutions across different teams and departments, ensuring coherence and interoperability.Lead technology evaluations and provide recommendations on new tools, platforms, and frameworks to enhance business capabilities.Promote innovation by identifying opportunities for title: Engineer
description: Job description for Software Engineer at Unitek SolusiUnitek SolusiGlobally experienced and based in Semarang, Unitek Solusi is a technology consultancy and software solution partner specialized in Business Process, Logistic, Tracking, and Automation.- Technology for humanity -We believe that technology is the right of everyone and every organization no matter the size.We believe that technology simplifies and improves the quality of people's life.Our mission is to empower local entrepreneurs and organizations to achieve more in their businesses using technology.The Work You Love"We believe the only way to do Great work is to Love your work."Working at Unitek SolusiMake an Impact to Indonesian Young and Growing Tech Ecosystem Indonesian Tech ecosystem is Young and Immature. We see a lot of shallow solution implementation with underestimated impact.We believe businesses of all sizes deserve a High Quality and Solid Solution. We are here to make a difference.Be Part of an Open and Collaborative Culture  Our company has a young climate. We put forward professionalism and work results, and we support direct communication above formality and politics.Everyone is Different  Everyone is different, everyone has their own roles and skills. We believe in putting the right people in the right place, yet working together as a team. We look forward to young applicants with dedication to learn and grow together as one team.The OpportunitySolving problems and implementing solutions fascinate you.You’re driven, analytical and a team player.You are looking for a key role in a fast growing companyAre you Qualified?WITH SKILLS, NOT DEGREESAt Unitek, we do not see your degrees. If you have the right skills, there is a place for you.WITH AN EAGERNESS TO LEARNThe world of technology is a fast-paced changing world. If you love continuous learning, your place is with us.WITH A DESIRE TO DO MOREAt Unitek, we understand our customers, deliver more, and exceed our customers' expectation. If you always want to do more, your place is with us.- Do it Great, or Don't Do it at All -Job DescriptionParticipate in entire application life-cycle- Write clean code to develop functional applications  - Peer Reviews  - Troubleshooting and debuggingSupport internal improvements- Build reusable code and libraries for future use - Propose and develop new features by monitoring the industry - Continuously improve your tech knowledge and skillsCollaborate closely with internal teams- Collaborate closely with other developers, supports, and consultants - Provide training and support to internal teamsWhat You'll Learn- You'll learn how to write clean code by adhering to our programming best practices and guidelines - You'll improve on linking server-side logic with a better end-user experience - You'll develop your problem-solving skills and be a team player - You'll learn how your developed solution be used in a real business organization and how it benefits themRequirementsYears of experience  - no official employment experience is required.  - experience in any official / unofficial projects are preferred.Skills set:  - Not with Degree but with Skills  - Logical thinking and object oriented mindset  - Knowledge of MVC architectures and Framework - Proficiency in any programming (Python / Java preferred) - Familiarity with database engine such as MySQL / PostgreSQL - Experience with Linux/Unix and server management  is a plus - Proficiency in code versioning tools such as Git is a plus   What we’re looking for in you:  - Desire to learn and adapt to new technologies - Desire to always do more - Able to work independently and effectively in a team - Strong attention to detail, analytical and love solving problems  - Good verbal and written communication skills - Ability to work in a fast-paced environment  - Excellent time management skillsRead Less

description: Job description for Web Developer at DigitamazeKami, Digitamaze, merupakan sebuah UMKM di bidang software house, sedang mencari Laravel Developer, React Developer, dan Python Developer untuk bergabung dengan tim kami yang dinamis. description:
Job description for IT Intern - BANDUNG at Solar ChapterJob Overview:Solar Chapter, a non-profit focused on clean water access and community development, is seeking a detail-oriented IT Intern to support data migration and management efforts. The intern will assist with organizing files, managing access permissions, and troubleshooting IT issues. This is a great opportunity for fresh graduates or current IT students to gain hands-on experience while contributing to a meaningful cause.Key Responsibilities:Transfer data from existing Google Drives to Google Shared Drives, ensuring all files are correctly organized, accessible, and backed up. Set appropriate permissions and access controls to ensure data security and compliance with organizational policies. Create a well-organized folder structure in the Shared Drive, based on input from various project teams.Identify and remove duplicate files, outdated versions, or unnecessary documents to streamline the database.Provide basic IT support related to file access issues, syncing problems, and any challenges during the migration process.Update the program team on migration progress, including any issues encountered and steps taken to resolve them.Prepare a user manual or guide for the new Shared Drive structure and conduct a brief training session for team members on accessing and using the Shared Drive efficiently.

Key Qualifications:Currently enrolled in or recent graduate of a Bachelor's degree program in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.Familiarity with Google Workspace (Google Drive, Shared Drives, Docs, Sheets, etc.).Basic understanding of data management and file organization principles.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Ability to work independently and manage tasks effectively with minimal supervision.Good communication skills, both written and verbal.Experience with database migration or IT project work is a plus but not required.Read Less

title: IT Intern - JABODETABEK
description: Job description for Software Development In test (SDET) at Software SeniSoftwareSeni is a Software Development Company based in Yogyakarta & Sydney, Australia. We have been designing and developing phone apps, websites, and mobile experiences. We love solving tough problems – from user experience to design and code.We build enterprise web-based solutions for clients all over the world, from Australia, Indonesia, Europe, Africa, and America. Our clients from Indonesia: Astra International, Traveloka, Angkasa Pura, Peduli Anak Foundation. Our clients from Australia: Bike Exchange, Downsizing, Red Balloon, Sectara, and many more.What will you get?Competitive Salary. We believe that salary is one of the main factors that keep the employee in the company, therefore we can guarantee a competitive salary for our Staff.Career Development & Training. We have a wonderful onboarding process where we help new team members get familiar with how we work. Reasonable & Flexible Schedules. We are encouraging a culture where people can have a good work-life balance. Our schedules are pretty flexible. Need to run an errand in the middle of the day? Totally cool. English Class. Working in SoftwareSeni means that you would get massive improvement in your English, both spoken and written guarantee!Annual Leave entitlement. 12 working days which can be taken after 3 months of joining.Salary Review Twice a year. We will review your salary twice annually in December and June. So, you can focus on your work and improve your performance every day.Relocation Allowance. We provide a relocation allowance if you do not live in Yogyakarta. The allowance will cover moving costs for you and your family.Staff Engagement Activities. We provide fun icebreaker activities in the middle of our working hours to chill and build relationships with all the staff. Sounds fun, right?Birthday Leave. We also want to celebrate our staff's happiest day by giving them half-day leave on their birthday.Responsibilities: Review and understand complex business/system requirements and design documents.Develop, create, and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases.Analyse test results, identify issues and report bugs and errors to development teams.Conduct extensive regression testing and thorough post-release/post-implementation testing.Collaborate closely with other QA engineers and cross-functional teams to ensure software quality.Mentor and guide junior QA engineers in software testing methodologies and best practices.Document detailed testing activities and results, and provide comprehensive test reports.Develop and maintain automated test scripts with minimal supervision.Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies in software testing.Requirements:Minimum 3 years of professional experience with an emphasis on software test automation including test framework design, development, and maintenance/support.Exceptional verbal and written communication skills to effectively communicate with team members, developers, and other stakeholders.Demonstrate proactive behavior, strong decision-making skills, time management skills, and leadership qualities to ensure quality standards and deliver high-quality products to the end-user.5+ years of experience in software testing, preferably in an Agile environment.Excellent understanding of the different phases of the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC).Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify, troubleshoot, and report software defects and issues.Proven ability to document test cases, test results, and software defects clearly and concisely.Extensive experience with manual testing techniques and tools such as DevOps or Jira for test case management, defect tracking, and project management.Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment, sharing information and ideas to achieve common goals.Deep understanding of API testing concepts, including different types of requests and how to validate API responses.Experience with automation tools such as Playwright or it’s fine if has other experience with Selenium WebDriver, Cypress, or Katalon.Proficiency in scripting languages such as C#, Python,  JavaScript for test automation.Proficient with CI/CD pipelines.Strong familiarity with software development processes and methodologies to effectively collaborate with developers..Preferred/Optional Skills and Education:Bachelor's or Master's degree in Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field.Proficiency in using debugging tools (e.g. Chrome DevTools).Certification in software testing (e.g., ISTQB, CSTE).Ability to provide technical guidance and support to other junior QA engineersRead Less

title: ERP Support & Maintenance
description:
Job description for Backend Developer at XCIDICWe are seeking a skilled and motivated Backend Developer to join our team. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the server-side logic and database structures that power our web applications. You will work closely with our frontend and design teams to ensure the seamless operation of our digital services.Job Description:Design, develop, and maintain robust and efficient server-side applications and databases.Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.Implement secure and scalable APIs to support frontend and mobile application functionality.Optimize application performance and ensure high availability and responsiveness.Troubleshoot and debug issues to maintain system integrity and reliability.Ensure data security and compliance with data protection regulations.Stay up-to-date with emerging backend technologies and best practices.Participate in code reviews and collaborate with cross-functional teams.Contribute to the enhancement of development processes and practices.

Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.Have proven experience min. 3 years as a Backend Developer with a strong portfolio of backend development projects A deep understanding of Node.js is necessary, as Nest.js is a Node.js framework.Proficiency in TypeScript: NestJS is built on top of TypeScript, so a strong understanding of this language is essential.Familiarity with the NestJS framework is crucial. title: IT Project Manager
description: Job description for System Administrator Linux & Windows at PT. RAKHASA ARTHA WISESAKami Mencari System Administrator Linux & WindowsBergabunglah dengan perusahaan kami untuk membangun dan mengelola infrastruktur server yang handal. Jadilah bagian penting dari tim yang mendukung pengembangan aplikasi AI dengan infrastruktur modern berbasis cloud, virtualisasi, dan jaringan berkinerja tinggi!---Kualifikasi:1. Pendidikan:  - Gelar S1/D4 dalam Teknologi Informasi, Teknik Informatika, Teknik Komputer, atau bidang terkait.2. Pengalaman:  - Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai System Administrator untuk sistem Linux dan Windows.  - Pengalaman mengelola server berbasis cloud, virtualisasi, dan jaringan.3. Keterampilan Teknis:  - Linux & Windows: Mahir dalam mengelola server berbasis Linux (Ubuntu, CentOS, Debian) dan Windows Server.  - Cloud Computing: Familiar dengan AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, atau OpenStack.  - Virtualisasi: Pengalaman menggunakan platform seperti VMware, Proxmox, atau VirtualBox.  - Jaringan: Pemahaman kuat tentang TCP/IP, DNS, VPN, dan konfigurasi firewall.  - DevOps Tools: Penguasaan Git, Docker, Kubernetes, dan CI/CD pipelines.  - Scripting: Kemampuan scripting menggunakan Bash, PowerShell, atau Python untuk otomasi tugas.4. Keterampilan Non-Teknis:  - Kemampuan troubleshooting yang cepat dan efektif.  - Kemampuan bekerja dalam tim dengan komunikasi yang baik.  - Mampu mengelola waktu dan tugas dengan baik dalam lingkungan kerja yang dinamis.---Tanggung Jawab:1. Manajemen Server:  - Menginstal, mengonfigurasi, dan memelihara server Linux dan Windows untuk mendukung aplikasi AI dan layanan lainnya.2. Pembuatan Infrastruktur Cloud:  - Merancang, mengimplementasikan, dan mengelola lingkungan cloud untuk penyimpanan data, komputasi, dan pengembangan AI.3. Virtualisasi:  - Membuat dan mengelola mesin virtual (VM) untuk pengujian, pengembangan, dan deployment aplikasi.4. DevOps & CI/CD:  - Membantu tim developer dengan integrasi sistem Git dan pipeline CI/CD untuk pengembangan aplikasi AI yang efisien.5. Keamanan & Jaringan:  - Mengonfigurasi dan memelihara jaringan server termasuk pengaturan firewall, VPN, dan kebijakan keamanan.6. Pemantauan & Pemeliharaan:  - Memastikan server berjalan optimal dengan monitoring dan backup secara rutin.  - Melakukan troubleshooting untuk memastikan uptime maksimal.7. Dokumentasi:  - Membuat dokumentasi lengkap terkait konfigurasi server, jaringan, dan prosedur operasional.---Tertarik? Kirimkan CV, sertifikasi terkait (jika ada), dan pengalaman proyek Anda ke career at rakhasa.com .Subjek email: System Administrator Linux & Windows – [Nama Anda]Mari bangun infrastruktur masa depan untuk mendukung pengembangan aplikasi AI yang inovatif!Read Less

title: Mid Quality Assurance
description: Job description for ERP Functional at PT Asiacross InvestindoJob Description :  We are seeking a highly experienced ERP Functional to responsible in the implementation, customization, and support of enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems, such as SAP, Oracle, iDempiere or Microsoft Dynamics. This role involves working closely with finance and accounting teams to ensure that the financial processes are effectively managed and aligned with the organization's overall business objectives. The primary responsibility is to bridge the gap between business requirements and technology solutions by working closely with clients or internal departments to understand their business processes and translate these into technical requirements. Key Responsibilities: Requirement Analysis: Work with stakeholders to understand their financial and accounting processes, business needs, pain points, and objectives. System Configuration: Set up key areas such as General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payable (AP), Accounts Receivable (AR), Asset Accounting (AA), and Controlling (CO) Solution Design: Configure the system to meet business needs, ensuring alignment with industry best practices. System Implementation: Lead or participate in the implementation of the ERP system, including system setup, data migration, and integration with other systems. Customization and Configuration: Develop functional specifications for any custom development required and work closely with developers to build and test these customizations. Testing: Develop test scenarios and execute testing to validate that the ERP configuration meets the business requirements. User Training: Create user manuals, training materials, and documentation to assist users in their daily operations. Reporting and Analysis: Develop and maintain financial reports using ERP Application, ensuring accurate financial data is available for decision-making. Continuous Improvement: eep abreast of new features and updates in the ERP software to provide value-added services to clients or the organization. Qualification :  Educational Background: A degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field is typically required.ERP Expertise: In-depth knowledge of specific ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics, iDempiere) and experience in configuring and implementing these systems.Financial Acumen: Strong understanding of financial accounting principles, controlling processes, and statutory reporting requirements. Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze complex business processes and translate them into effective solutions. Problem-Solving: Aptitude for identifying issues and implementing practical solutions within the ERP environment. Communication: Excellent communication skills to interact with both technical teams and business users. Project Management: Experience in managing or participating in ERP implementation projects, with the ability to handle multiple tasks and deadlines. Read Less

title: Golang Backend Developer
description: Job description for Backend Developer (Javascript) at PT. RAKHASA ARTHA WISESAKami Mencari Backend Engineer (JavaScript) yang Berbakat!Bergabunglah dengan perusahaan kami untuk mengembangkan sistem backend yang andal, cepat, dan asinkron. Peran ini penting dalam membangun infrastruktur backend untuk mendukung aplikasi berbasis AI yang inovatif di masa depan.---Kualifikasi:1. Pendidikan:  - Gelar S1/D4 dalam Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, atau bidang terkait.2. Pengalaman:  - Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman dalam pengembangan backend menggunakan JavaScript/Node.js.  - Terbiasa menangani aplikasi berbasis data besar dengan performa tinggi.3. Keterampilan Teknis:  - JavaScript/Node.js: Mahir dalam pengembangan backend menggunakan Node.js, termasuk pengelolaan async/await dan event-driven programming.  - Database: Pengalaman dengan basis data relasional (MySQL, PostgreSQL) dan non-relasional (MongoDB, Redis).  - Optimasi Performa: Kemampuan merancang dan mengimplementasikan query yang optimal dan database caching.  - API Development: Pengalaman membuat RESTful dan GraphQL API.  - Cloud Services: Familiar dengan penyimpanan cloud dan deployment menggunakan AWS, GCP, atau Azure.  - Testing & Debugging: Terbiasa menggunakan alat seperti Jest, Mocha, atau Chai untuk pengujian aplikasi.4. Keterampilan Non-Teknis:  - Kemampuan analitis yang kuat untuk memecahkan masalah performa dan skalabilitas.  - Mampu bekerja dalam tim lintas fungsi dan berkolaborasi dengan tim data dan AI.  - Berorientasi pada kualitas dan detail dalam setiap pengembangan sistem.---Tanggung Jawab:1. Pengembangan Backend:  - Merancang dan mengembangkan sistem backend yang cepat, aman, dan skalabel menggunakan Node.js.  - Mengelola asinkronitas aplikasi untuk meningkatkan performa dan efisiensi.2. Manajemen Basis Data:  - Membangun dan mengoptimalkan database relasional dan non-relasional untuk kebutuhan aplikasi.  - Mengimplementasikan caching dan indexing untuk meningkatkan kecepatan akses data.3. Pengembangan API:  - Membuat API RESTful dan GraphQL yang efisien dan mudah diintegrasikan.  - Mendukung integrasi dengan aplikasi berbasis AI dan sistem lainnya.4. Optimasi Sistem:  - Memonitor dan meningkatkan performa server backend untuk memastikan uptime maksimal.  - Menerapkan solusi pengolahan data besar dengan latensi rendah.5. Kolaborasi Tim:  - Bekerja sama dengan tim front-end, DevOps, dan AI untuk memastikan pengembangan aplikasi berjalan lancar.  - Memberikan masukan teknis untuk arsitektur sistem dan infrastruktur teknologi.6. Dokumentasi:  - Membuat dokumentasi teknis lengkap untuk API, basis data, dan sistem backend lainnya.---Tertarik? title: Database Administrator
description: Job description for Technical Lead (System Development) at PT. Multi Guna GemilangPT. Multi Guna Gemilang is hiring!Job Title :  Tech Lead (System Development)We are looking for an experienced and visionary Technical Lead to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent leadership skills, and a passion for digital innovation and AI.  You will be responsible for guiding our development team, driving technical excellence, and ensuring successful delivery of our projects.Job Description•	Lead and manage a team of developers, providing technical guidance and mentorship.•	Collaborate with project managers, clients, designers, and other stakeholders to define project requirements and deliverables.•	Manage project timelines , resources and budgets.•	Timely progress updates to management and clients.•	Conduct code reviews, troubleshoot technical issues, and optimize performance.•	Ensure adherence to best practices in software development, including version control, testing, and documentation.•	Facilitate team meeting and agile ceremonies (e.g. daily stand-ups. sprint review and backlog)•	Contribute to the strategic planning and technical direction of the company.•	Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, and integrate them into our projects to drive innovation.•	Hands-on coding and system building.•	Troubleshoot and debug issues to ensure smooth system operation.•	Create and maintain technical documentation for system components.•	Ensure timely resolution of bugs and performance bottlenecks.•	Drive initiatives to improve development processes and system capabilities.•	Facilitate cross-team collaboration to ensure cohesive system development.•	Encourage a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the team. This blend of responsibilities as a Tech Lead, you are not only steering the technical direction of projects but also actively contributing to the development and maintenance of the system. Your role is crucial in bridging the gap between strategic planning and hands-on execution, ensuring successful project delivery and continuous improvement of the system.Qualifications:•	Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.•	5-10 years of professional software development experience.•	At least 2-5 years in a leadership role.•	Proficiency in Java, Javascript, .Net •	Strong understanding of system architecture and design principles.•	Experience with Cloud and DevOps tools and practices.•	Excellent project management skills.•	Relevant certifications are a plus.•	Willingness to learn and adopt new technologies especially in AI.•	Able to work in a fast paced , agile project environment.•	Good communication skills, fluent in English and ability to work effectively with cross functional and global team.Shortlisted candidates will be required to sit for a test.Salary will commensurate with experience.Read Less

description: Job description for Business Intelligence and Integration Technologist at PT Boon SoftwareJob Title: Business Intelligence and Integration TechnologistRole Summary: In the role of Business Intelligence and Integration Technologist, you will be instrumental in creating and deploying sophisticated integration solutions tailored for e-commerce platforms, as well as developing state-of-the-art Business Intelligence tools. This role is crafted for individuals who are just starting their professional journey — recent graduates or interns who are not just passionate about technology but are eager to make a significant impact in the realms of data integration and analytics.Qualifications:•	A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or a related discipline.•	A solid grounding in the principles and methodologies of software development.•	An understanding of data integration and business intelligence principles.•	Proficiency in JavaScript & Java and other contemporary programming languages.•	A quick learner, adept at mastering new technologies.•	Exceptional problem-solving abilities coupled with meticulous attention to detail.•	Strong interpersonal skills, capable of clear communication and effective collaboration.•	A self-starter, able to independently manage multiple projects with strict deadlines.Key Responsibilities:•	Develop and implement integration solutions to streamline e-commerce operations, ensuring seamless connectivity between disparate systems and platforms.•	Utilize expertise to design scalable and efficient integration architectures.•	Utilize Business Intelligence tools to create insightful data visualizations and analytical reports.•	Collaborate closely with multi-disciplinary teams to understand and address business needs effectively.•	Engage in all phases of the software development lifecycle, from initial conceptualization to deployment and post-deployment support.•	Ensure the delivery of high-quality solutions that meet or exceed business needs and requirements.•	Stay current with emerging trends and technologies in the business intelligence and data integration landscape that able to enhance the integration capabilities.•	Tackling technical challenges and apply problem-solving skills to uphold the highest standard of quality in deliverables.•	Actively participating to the enhancement of integration processes and methodologies to the new or current software.What We Offer:•	Hands-on experience with impactful projects in a leading-edge technological environment.•	A vibrant and supportive atmosphere conducive to significant professional growth.•	Mentorship from industry veterans and continuous professional development opportunities.•	A career trajectory that rewards innovation and expertise.How to Apply:Please send your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and educational background to recruit @boonsoftware.com with the subject line "Business Intelligence and Integration Technologist Application."Read Less

title: Business Intelligence and Integration Technologist
description: Job description for Application Support Specialist at PT Boon SoftwareJob Title:Application Support Specialist At Boon Software, we are seeking a dedicated Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic IT team. In this role, you will be the cornerstone of support for our suite of applications, offering solutions and technical assistance to our valued end-users. Your mission will be to ensure seamless application functionality by engaging in proactive management, meticulous maintenance, and efficient troubleshooting. You will act as a liaison between users and our technical squads—comprising development and testing experts—to spearhead the diagnosis and resolution of complex application issues. Your technical acumen will be vital in devising innovative solutions, spearheading enhancements, and formulating strategic workarounds to mitigate recurring challenges. Join us and play a pivotal role in upholding our commitment to delivering exceptional application support and enhancing user experience.Requirements:1.	Educational Qualifications: A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a closely related field. Alternatively, an equivalent combination of education and experience in similar technical domains may be considered.2.	Experience: A minimum of three years of experience in technical helpdesk support, particularly with Logistics Execution Systems or other enterprise applications. Applicants should have a history of addressing customer inquiries, troubleshooting issues, and providing actionable solutions.3.	Technical Skills: Proficiency in diagnosing and resolving issues with enterprise-level software applications. Candidates should have hands-on experience with system configurations, performance tuning, and ensuring the reliability of application operations.4.	Problem-Solving: Strong analytical capabilities with a proven record of tackling complex problems, implementing solutions that prevent recurring issues, and improving overall system functionality.5.	System Knowledge: A broad understanding of various operating systems, databases, and programming environments, with an aptitude for quickly adapting to new technologies.6.	Independence and Teamwork: The ability to work effectively both as an independent professional and as an integral member of a team, contributing to a cooperative and productive work environment.7.	Web Application Insight: Insight into the workings of web applications, including front-end user interfaces and back-end databases, is highly desirable.8.	Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate technical issues and solutions clearly to a varied audience.9.	Language Proficiency: High proficiency in English, both spoken and written, is required to manage documentation and communication within a diverse workplace.Application Support Specialist is expected to:1.	Technical Support: Provide comprehensive assistance for application-related issues, managing and maintaining system integrity, and ensuring prompt troubleshooting.2.	Collaboration: Work closely with development and testing teams to pinpoint and resolve complex application problems, playing a crucial role in the enhancement and solution implementation process.3.	Incident Handling: Swiftly address and resolve user-reported problems, maintaining high standards of incident resolution.4.	User Support: Actively assist end-users, providing clear instructions and support to facilitate smooth application usage.5.	Documentation: Keep meticulous records of issues, their resolutions, and any related troubleshooting activities.6.	Analysis: Conduct thorough investigations into recurring or significant issues to determine underlying causes and take preventive measures for future occurrences.7.	Team Coordination: Engage in continuous collaboration with development and testing teams to improve communication and resolve issues effectively.8.	SLA Adherence: Ensure prompt issue resolution in accordance with established service level agreements to maintain customer satisfaction.9.	Escalation Management: Elevate complex issues to technical teams as required.10.	Monitoring: Stay vigilant with system alerts to preemptively address potential disruptions.To apply for the Application Support Specialist position, please submit your application along with your updated resume to recruit @ boonsoftware.com. Due to the high volume of applications, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further discussions.Read Less

Headquartered in Shenzhen, China, we are industry pioneers, providing efficient, secure, and stable communication solutions, as well as customized software and website development services for clients worldwide. Our IM messaging systems are praised for their excellent performance, low latency, and strong scalability, widely used in enterprise internal communication, customer service, online education, social platforms, and more. title: Data Engineer
description:
Job description for Front-end Developer at MadeIndonesiaAbout Us:MadeIndonesia leads in technology solutions, expanding from web development to offering graphic design, video marketing, and precise data services. Based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia, our diverse team blends European management with local talent, fostering collaborative excellence and innovation.Job Description:We are seeking a talented and versatile Front-End Developer proficient in both React and WordPress. You will work closely with our design and back-end development teams to create interactive, high-performance web applications. Your primary focus will be developing responsive user interfaces, building reusable components, and ensuring seamless functionality across different platforms and browsers.

Key Responsibilities:Develop new user-facing features using ReactJS and WordPress.Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.Convert HTML templates into custom WordPress themes and plugins using PHP, JavaScript, and CSS. ensuring high performance and compatibility.Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.Optimize components for maximum performance across various web-capable devices and browsers.Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to ensure seamless integration and optimal functionality.Utilize testing tools to ensure quality assurance and oversee project deployment.Participate in agile ceremonies and collaborate effectively with team members using version control tools like Git and GitHub.Provide input on UI/UX design improvements and enhancements.
RequirementsMinimum of 1-2 years of professional experience as a Front-End Developer.Strong proficiency in JavaScript, ReactJS, and WordPress development.Knowledge of Typescript and basic understanding of Angular or VueJs is a plus.Experience with build tools such as Webpack.Hands-on experience with HTML/CSS, CSS preprocessors (SASS), and front-end frameworks like Bootstrap.Experience with PHP and integrating RESTful APIs.Familiarity with atomic design structure and responsive design principles.Familiarity with testing tools and deployment processes.Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles.Experience with version control systems such as Git and GitHub.Familiarity with agile methodologies and tools like Trello, TeamGantt or similar project management software.Good time management and problem-solving skills with a proactive, can-do attitude.Good communication skills in both written and spoken English.Ability to work on-site (WFO) in Sleman, Yogyakarta.
BenefitsJoin our dynamic team and enjoy a range of amazing benefits, including:Free English classes to enhance your communication skills.Monthly lunch allowance.Access to a cafeteria with free coffee, tea, and healthy snacks provided by a full-time barista.Private health insurance coverage.Sports activities to promote a healthy lifestyle.Team-building events to foster a supportive and enjoyable work environment.Access to online courses to improve and develop your technical skills.Birthday gift to celebrate employees’ special day.Read Less

Job Descriptions- Design, developing, and maintaining automated test scripts for web and mobile applications using industry-standard test automation tools and frameworks- Execute automated test suites for functional, and regression testing- Collaborate with the team to continuously optimize and improve existing test automation scripts for efficiency and reliability.- Work closely with senior Test Automation Engineers, Quality Control (Software Tester), software developers, and Product Owners to understand software requirements and ensure comprehensive test coverage- Actively participate in team meetings, knowledge-sharing sessions, and training programs to enhance skills- Contribute to the development and improvement of QE/QA processes, methodologies, and best practices- Review and provide feedback on test plans, test cases, and other QA documentation to ensure accuracy and completeness- Provide technical assistance to troubleshoot and resolve issues related to automated test scripts and testing environments- Collaborate with the team to identify and address- Maintain detailed and organized records of test results, defects, and test coverage- Assist in preparing test summary reports and documentation for internal and external stakeholders


B. Requirements- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science / Information Technology with GPA > 3.00- Minimum 2-year experience in test automation development for web application- Experience in coding using Java or JavaScript programming language- Have knowledge in using test automation tools and frameworks, such as Katalon, Appium, etc- Familiarity with software testing principles and methodologies is a plus- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail- Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment- Enthusiasm for learning and staying updated with the latest trends and technologies in software testing and test automationRead Less

title: Business Analyst (Telecommunications Industry)
description: Job description for Fullstack Web App Developper at FMTPLAHello,*Python and NextJS Required*We are a dynamic and growing technology agency, constantly evolving and adapting to new challenges. As we enter the next phase of our growth, we're looking for a skilled Full Stack Web App Developer to make a significant impact on our latest project.Our current initiative is focused on developing a faceless automation tool. We have a strong community and an influencer to promote the project.The Goal for you is to make two features:Reddit Story VideosAI Videos story We've got a few GitHub folders on hand to help you create to get the features out as quickly as possible.We're expecting big growth, given that one of the members of the marketing team is an influencer on the networks and has a large e-mail base of people interested only in creating content without showing their faces (+ 15,000 ultra-qualified newsletter subscribers).Your expertise in full-stack development will be crucial to the success of this project, as you will be the second developer of this company.If you like challenges, this is the job for you.Here's an outline of your role and responsibilities:Immediate Project Goals:Develop the core functionality for MVP.Implement user interface elements for account creation and management.Work towards an initial version ready for beta testing within a two-to-three-week timeframe.Subsequent Responsibilities:Efficiently manage and rectify bugs identified during the beta phase.Ensure the system's scalability and robustness for increased traffic.Facilitate the transition of the project as required.Ongoing maintenance, debugging, and iterative feature development.Core Responsibilities:Engage actively in all software development stages, from concept to deployment.Regular participation in project meetings to discuss progress and tackle challenges.Requirements:Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer.Familiarity with Python and FFmpeg for backend development.Experience with Next.js for frontend development.Familiarity with Supabase is highly preferred.Bonus: Experience with Remotion for video rendering.Knowledge of agile development methodologies.Strong command of English, both in writing and speaking.Independent, proactive work style with strong problem-solving skills.This role is crucial for a quick turnaround: the first version of the project must be ready for beta testing within 1 week. Following this, the contract will be reviewed and potentially renewed at the end of the month, based on the achievement of set objectives.This is a full-time remote position. The specifics of your compensation, aligned with industry standards and your experience, will be discussed during the interview.To apply, please forward your CV and include the word "Ewaa" at the end of your application, confirming your thorough understanding of the role and its requirements.Thank you for considering this opportunity to join the FMTPLA team. We are excited about the potential of having your expertise contribute to this innovative project.Best regards,Read Less

title: teknisi
description: Job description for Teknisi komputer dan cctv at Barcom Computer & CCTV Karanganyar* Pria,usia maximal 30 th* Pendidikan min.SMA/SMK* Berpengalaman dibidang teknisi* percaya diri, Ramah, Jujur dan rajin * terbiasa dengan target* mampu bekerja sama dengan tim* ⁠fresh graduate are very welcomeInstalasi:Melakukan instalasi perangkat keras CCTV, termasuk kamera, kabel, dan perangkat perekam.Memasang dan mengkonfigurasi perangkat lunak CCTV.Memastikan instalasi sesuai dengan standar dan spesifikasi yang telah ditetapkan.Pemeliharaan:Melakukan pemeriksaan rutin terhadap sistem CCTV untuk memastikan kinerja yang optimal.Melakukan kalibrasi dan penyetelan kamera CCTV.Mengganti komponen yang rusak atau aus.Perbaikan:Mendiagnosis dan memperbaiki masalah pada sistem CCTV.Melakukan troubleshooting untuk mengatasi masalah teknis.Menyediakan solusi yang efektif dan efisien untuk masalah yang timbul.Dokumentasi:Membuat laporan mengenai pekerjaan yang telah dilakukan, termasuk hasil pemeriksaan, perbaikan, dan perubahan konfigurasi.Memperbarui dokumentasi sistem CCTV secara berkala.Pelatihan:Bersedia mengikuti pelatihan untuk meningkatkan pengetahuan dan keterampilan terkait teknologi CCTV terbaru.Read Less

title: Teknisi komputer dan cctv
description: Job description for Presales / IT Support at PT Panduwan Aditian TeknologiDeskripsi Pekerjaan :Kami butuh individu berpengalaman dalam Presales / IT Support untuk pengelolaan infrastruktur perusahaan dan turut serta dalam proyek-proyek yang memerlukan keahlian teknis serta pemahaman mendalam tentang kebutuhan pelanggan.Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Pekerjaan :Menangani kegiatan presales dengan fokus pada pendekatan kepada calon pelanggan, menyediakan informasi produk atau layanan yang komprehensif, serta menjelaskan manfaatnya.Membangun hubungan yang kuat dengan calon pelanggan, mendengarkan kebutuhan mereka, dan memberikan solusi yang sesuai.Menyusun proposal penawaran yang terperinci sesuai dengan kebutuhan pelanggan.Memberikan presentasi produk atau layanan kepada calon pelanggan, menjelaskan fitur, manfaat, dan keunggulannya.Berkolaborasi erat dengan tim Sales untuk memastikan semua informasi yang diperlukan tersedia.Berpartisipasi dalam pemeliharaan dan pembaruan perangkat lunak serta sistem IT.Memecahkan masalah teknis, mengidentifikasi penyebabnya, dan memberikan solusi secara efektif.Menjalankan CRM Internal Perusahaan.Kualifikasi :Umur 27 - 36 Tahun.Latar belakang pendidikan atau pengalaman dalam bidang IT atau teknologi.Memiliki pengalaman minimal 2 tahun di bidang IT Support atau sebagai Presales.Mendalami dan menguasai dasar-dasar komputer dan jaringan, termasuk Router, Wireless, Mikrotik, serta komponen jaringan lainnya.Kemampuan berkomunikasi dan presentasi yang baik, dengan kemampuan untuk menjelaskan ide dan konsep teknis dengan juid dan meyakinkan.Memiliki minat dan gairah tinggi terhadap teknologi informasi, serta up-to-date dengan perkembangan terkini dalam industri.Mampu menerima tantangan baru dan selalu siap untuk belajar.Memiliki sikap kerja yang baik, termasuk etika kerja, tanggung jawab, dan kolaborasi yang efektif.Read Less
