title: Data Center Administrator for Finance
description:
Job description for Electro Maintenance at Berlian Artha LabelAnda mahir dalam arus lemah (PCB Board) ? Mampu analisis teknikal kelistrikan ?BAL adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di industry pembuatan Garment's Woven Label, Printed Label and Offset Printing yang sedang berkembang dengan cepat.

Menjadi salah satu nominated supplier brand International H&M.Jika Anda tidak hanya ingin sekedar bekerja, namun juga mau maju bersama dan menjadi bagian dari perusahaan, kami tunggu resume Anda. Persyaratan:Minimum Lulusan (S1) Electrical Engineer, Mechanical Engineering, Teknik KelistrikanPengalaman minimum 5 years di Garment's industry;Familiar/competent dalam memperbaiki arus lemah (PCB Board)Memiliki POP dan K3 Listrik certificate diutamakan

Tugas & Tanggung Jawab:Profesi Electrical & Mechanical Engineer ini juga diperuntukkan bagi Anda yang mencari posisi: Operation Electrical Engineer, Technician & Electrical MaintenanceMerawat serta memperbaiki unit dan fasilitas kelistrikan guna menunjang efektivitas kegiatan operasional perusahaan.Membuat laporan kemajuan (progress) terkait fasilitas dan infrastruktur kelistrikan di area operasional secara rutin sesuai ketentuan yang telah disepakati.Memberikan pelayanan teknis kepada Departemen atau Divisi lainnya yang membutuhkan bantuan terkait kegiatan operasional kelistrikan.Menyusun analisis teknikal kelistrikan dan identifikasi fasilitas pendukung yang dibutuhkan di area operasional yang sesuai dengan rencana perusahaan jangka pendek, menengah dan panjang.Mengawasi proses penggunaan fasilitas dan infrastruktur kelistrikan, misalnya pendistribusian daya listrik siap pakai di area operasional agar berjalan sesuai dengan jadwal, spesifikasi dan anggaran biaya yang sudah ditetapkan.Benefits :Bekerja 6 hari dalam seminggu, Senin hingga SabtuBonus Bulanan: Berdasarkan kinerja pribadi & kinerja perusahaanBonus Tahunan: Berdasarkan kinerja perusahaan & pribadiQuarterly Team Celebration & Annual Rewards Trip: Berdasarkan kinerja perusahaanFull Employment: Status kepegawaian tetap & full timeBPJS KetenagakerjaanTunjangan Hari Raya (THR)

Jika Anda tidak ingin sekedar bekerja, namun juga belajar bersama di Sekolah Kehidupan ini, kami tunggu Anda sebelum tanggal 10 Desember 2024. ACTION sekarang juga!All CVs will be handled strictly confidential and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.Read Less

title: Technical Support Coordinator
description: Job description for Senior Back-End Developer at WidaTechJob Responsibilities Lead a small team of back-end developers, providing guidance, support, and mentorship. Design and implement efficient, reusable, and reliable back-end code and APIs. Design and manage database architecture and server integration. Manage & optimize databases and review team members’ code to ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers and product managers, to define and execute requirements. Troubleshoot, debug, and enhance existing applications to ensure a high standard of quality. Ensure security and data protection throughout the back-end architecture. Drive continuous improvements in back-end development practices, encouraging a high standard of quality across the team. Stay up to date with new back-end technologies and industry trends to improve processes and solutions. Optimize backend processes and code for maximum performance, scalability, and reliability. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, Information System, or related field. 2-3 years of professional experience in back-end development, including experience in a senior or lead role (proven track record of leading small teams, mentoring developers, and reviewing code effectively). Strong expertise in server-side languages such as Node.js, Golang, Java, or Python. Solid experience with database management (SQL and NoSQL) and familiarity with MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. Proficiency in API development (RESTful, GraphQL) and familiarity with microservices architecture. Strong knowledge of Javascript is a must. Understanding of software engineering best practices including unit testing, continuous integration, continuous deployment, and source control. Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git. Ability to work in a disciplined Agile environment with a commitment to appropriate engineering practices and regular delivery cycles. Ability to collaborate in a team environment and contribute to collaborative problem-solving. Fluent in both written and spoken English. Additional Information:Our work arrangement is full Work From Office The salary range for this position is around 8-10 million (depends on the technical interview result)Read Less

modem, switch) di lokasi pelanggan.Melakukan konfigurasi layanan internet sesuai dengan standar teknis perusahaan.Memastikan jaringan internet pelanggan berjalan sesuai dengan paket yang ditawarkan.Pemeliharaan dan Dukungan Teknis:Menyediakan dukungan teknis kepada pelanggan untuk masalah jaringan, koneksi internet, atau perangkat keras.Mengidentifikasi, mendiagnosa, dan menyelesaikan masalah jaringan, baik jarak jauh maupun di lokasi pelanggan.Menyediakan solusi untuk gangguan layanan dengan cepat dan efektif.Monitoring Kinerja Jaringan:Mengawasi dan menganalisa kinerja jaringan menggunakan alat monitoring untuk memastikan kualitas layanan.Mengambil tindakan preventif untuk menghindari downtime atau gangguan layanan.Pengembangan dan Implementasi Infrastruktur Jaringan:Berpartisipasi dalam perancangan dan pengembangan jaringan ISP untuk meningkatkan cakupan dan kinerja.Membantu dalam implementasi proyek upgrade jaringan dan infrastruktur IT.Manajemen Dokumentasi dan Pelaporan:Membuat laporan berkala tentang masalah jaringan, pemeliharaan, dan perbaikan yang dilakukan.Menyimpan catatan konfigurasi perangkat keras dan perangkat lunak.Kerja Sama dengan Tim Teknis Lainnya:Berkolaborasi dengan tim support, tim NOC (Network Operations Center), dan vendor untuk penyelesaian masalah teknis.Berkoordinasi dengan tim sales dan account management untuk memahami kebutuhan pelanggan.Kualifikasi:Pendidikan: Diploma atau Sarjana di bidang Teknik Informatika, Teknik Elektro, atau bidang terkait.Pengalaman: Pengalaman minimal 2-3 tahun di bidang teknis ISP atau jaringan telekomunikasi.Keterampilan Teknis:Pengetahuan mendalam tentang jaringan TCP/IP, router, switch, firewall, dan perangkat jaringan lainnya.Pengalaman dalam mengkonfigurasi perangkat dari vendor seperti Cisco, MikroTik, atau Juniper.Pemahaman tentang protokol jaringan seperti OSPF, BGP, MPLS.Familiar dengan troubleshooting jaringan menggunakan alat seperti Wireshark, PRTG, atau Nagios.Kemampuan Komunikasi: Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik untuk berinteraksi dengan pelanggan dan tim internal.Sertifikasi (Opsional): CCNA, JNCIA, atau sertifikasi lainnya dalam jaringan lebih diutamakan.Keterampilan Tambahan:Kemampuan untuk bekerja di bawah tekanan dalam situasi darurat.Sikap proaktif dalam menangani masalah teknis.Pengalaman dalam menangani troubleshooting remote dan onsite.Read Less

title: Power BI Developer
description: Job description for Power BI Apps at OCTA Infinite SolutionsRequirements•	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.•	Minimum of 5 years of experience developing Power Apps solutions.•	Proficiency in Power Apps formula language (Canvas Apps) and model-driven app development.•	Strong understanding of Microsoft Power Platform architecture and components.•	Experience with Microsoft Power Automate, Power BI, and Common Data Service (CDS).•	Knowledge of Microsoft Azure services, including Azure Logic Apps and Azure Functions, is a plus.•	Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.•	Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.Job Description:1.	Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into Power Apps solutions.2.	Design and develop custom Power Apps applications, forms, and workflows to automate business processes. 3.	Extensive experience to Implement solutions on the Microsoft Power Platform, PowerApps.4.	Use multiple Connectors with PowerApps and Flow, and preferably create custom connectors for PowerApps and Microsoft Flow.5.	Address and remediate security vulnerability findings in PowerApps.6.	Create documentation for projects including design, asset inventory, diagrams, and presentations as well as documentation of the environment and deployment for our support and future implementations teams.7.	Customize and extend standard Power Apps functionality using Power Automate, Power BI, and other Microsoft Power Platform tools.8.	Integrate Power Apps solutions with existing systems and data sources, including SharePoint, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and third-party APIs.9.	Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of Power Apps solutions.10.	Provide technical support and troubleshooting for Power Apps applications in production environments.11.	Experience developing the PowerApps model.12.	A clear understanding of PowerApps formulas and development methods.13.	Knowledge of PowerApps and Flow licensing plans and features included in different plans.14.	Strong foundational knowledge of Office 365 platform including Exchange, Intune, Azure AD, and Azure ecosystem.15.	Strong project management skills with strong attention to detail.16.	Experience customizing SharePoint lists and disparate systems with PowerApps17.	Interpret and design database models (MYSQL, SQL Server, etc. ).18.	Knowledge & prior work experience on Snowflake will be plus for this positionRead Less

title: QA Intern
description: Job description for Full Stack Programmer at PT Astronacci InternationalBantu kami mencari team yang hebat!We need people who, when they hear "it can't be done", then they FIGURE OUT how to do it anyway.Kami membutuhkan kandidat yang mampu untuk mengembangkan Front-End Website arsitektur & Back-End Website Application. Melakukan perancangan User Interaction pada Web Pages juga merupakan tugas utama kamu. Membuat server dan database untuk keperluan fungsionalitas perusahaan. Memastikan optimasi lintas platform untuk mobile phone dan memastikan daya tanggap (responsiveness) dari aplikasi. Bekerjasama dengan Graphic Designer untuk fitur desain website merupakan salah satu hal yang harus kamu lakukan. Melakukan desain dan mengembangkan API. Yang paling utama adalah tetap mengikuti pengembangan pada aplikasi website dan bahasa pemrogram-anKalau kamu memiliki kualifikasi dibawah ini:1. Jika kamu memiliki gelar minimal D3 atau sarjana dari jurusan Ilmu Komputer2. Kamu minimal memiliki pengalaman selama 2 tahun dengan posisi yang sama 3. Jika kamu memiliki kekuatan dalam berorganisasi baik dan kemampuan baik dalam melakukan project4. Pastinya kamu harus memiliki kecakapan dengan bahasa Front-End dasar seperti, HTML, CSS, dan Javascript5. Terbiasa dengan JavaScript Library React (typescript)6. Mahir dengan bahasa Server-side seperti, Express, Node dan PHP7. Terbiasa mengoperasikan teknologi database seperti, MySQL, MongoDB, postgre dan Rest APIs8. Terbiasa dengan teknologi database dalam memori seperti Redis9. Pastinya kamu harus memiliki kemampuan luar biasa dalam berkomunikasi secara verbal maupun non-verbal10. Kamu juga harus memiliki problem solving yang bagus, serta memperhatikan detail dengan baikBenefit yang akan kamu dapatkan:1. Jenjang karir di perusahaan kami bukan berlandaskan asas senioritas. Asal kamu memberikan performance terbaik, karir kamu bisa terus menanjak2. Kamu udah gak perlu lagi bingung cari makan siang karena kita siapin kamu makan siang di kantor3. Bonus tahunan4. Mengatur alokasi penyimpanan yang efisien sesuai dengan kebutuhan perusahaan.- Menerapkan enkripsi dan kebijakan keamanan cloud untuk melindungi data dari akses yang tidak sah dan ancaman siber.- Merancang, mengonfigurasi, dan mengelola infrastruktur cloud termasuk server virtual, jaringan cloud (VPC), dan pengaturan keamanan jaringan cloud.- Menangani skalabilitas jaringan dan cloud storage untuk mendukung pertumbuhan data dan kebutuhan komputasi, memastikan performa optimal.- Bekerja sama dengan tim pengembangan, sistem administrator, dan arsitek infrastruktur untuk memastikan integrasi dan performa sistem berjalan lancar.Read Less

title: Backend Developer - Internship
description: Job description for Analis Operasi IT at Sinergis InvestmentMax System is Hiring! # Who We Are:  Max System is a KPI-Based System Solution for Enterprises, providing modern tools to enhance company scalability and efficiency. Our solutions cover sales management, data recording, reporting, and KPI tracking, ensuring seamless business operations. Our Solutions includingBusiness Control:Leverage IoT technology to monitor your business with tools like Smart Breakers and Smart Traffic Counters.  Key Performance Indicator: Real-time insights into business targets vs. actual achievements, across departments, individuals, and branches.  Scalable Business:  Easily open and manage new branch locations using a system that tracks operations and sales remotely.  ---# Position : Business Analyst IT# Company : Max System# Key Responsibilities:	•	Collaborate with stakeholders to understand and document business requirements.	•	Analyze and translate business needs into technical specifications for IT development teams.	•	Provide strategic insights and recommendations to optimize business processes.	•	Lead cross-functional teams and ensure successful project implementation.	•	Act as a liaison between business units and IT teams, ensuring alignment and seamless communication.# Requirements:	•	Minimum 3 years of experience in a similar role.	•	Strong understanding of IT development processes and a solid business sense.	•	Proven leadership skills, with experience managing teams or leading projects.	•	Exceptional conceptual and analytical thinking capabilities to solve complex problems effectively.	•	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for stakeholder engagement.Why Join Us?	•	Work with a forward-thinking team in a collaborative environment.	•	Be part of innovative projects that drive business success.	•	Opportunities for professional growth and development.# Placement:Willing to be placed in Jakarta Barat (Tanjung Duren) / Bandung (Istana Bandung Electronic Center)# Join us and grow with Max System!  Are you passionate about bridging the gap between technology and business? Max System is looking for an experienced Business Analyst IT to join our dynamic team. If you have a knack for analyzing complex systems, understanding business needs, and leading impactful projects, we’d love to hear from you.Read Less

title: Back-end Developer
min_exp: Less than a year of experience
description:
Job description for Junior Software Developer at PT Stampindo Lancar JayaAbout You

Are you someone who enjoys working in an environment where:
* You participate in creating best in class mobile apps in Indonesia
* You work with some of the best Python and mobile developers in Indonesia
* You develop big data products that scales to serve many millions of customers
* Casual and fun working environment. Strictly no office politics!
* Work/life balance is respected

If you enjoy working programming and learning about new technologies, you have come to the right place. We're looking for the best talents in Indonesia who want to constantly push the boundaries of what's possible.About StampsStamps is the biggest cloud-based CRM/loyalty platform in Indonesia,  serving numerous leading brands with hundreds of thousands of unique members (and growing fast). We are looking for the best technical talents to scale the platform to accommodate millions of users.We are one of the best mobile development companies  in Indonesia, being national winners of the prestigious Bubu Awards,  the largest digital event in Indonesia for two consecutive years. We won  the 2014 award by making GO-JEK's iOS App and the 2015 award by making  Setipe's iOS app.Our main development focus are our core platform and the mobile  ecosystems - iOS and Android based apps so by joining us, you will learn  to write the best mobile apps in Indonesia.As such, we offer multiple developer opportunities in Stamps: - Backend engineer: responsible for main application logic, server and network infrastructure. - Frontend engineer: responsible for creating user friendly, fluid user interfaces. - Mobile engineer: responsible for iOS and Android apps.  Requirements:1-3 years’ experience as Software Developer.Passionate in developing systems that require performance and scale.Solid understanding of object oriented programming language is required.Plus points:Active in contributing to various open source projects. Stamps use a  lot of open source components and we try to contribute back to the  community and maintain a few popular projects.Have prior experience in developing iOS/Android Apps.Read Less
